thread.title: Busch Gardens: Things to note for Howl-O-Scream 2015
thread.title_full: Busch Gardens: Things to note for Howl-O-Scream 2015

author: Matt Mauney
title: Busch Gardens: Things to note for Howl-O-Scream 2015
text:
Howl-O-Scream opens at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay 
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay Creative Director Scott Swenson talks about this year's Howl-O-Scream. 
Busch Gardens Tampa Bay Creative Director Scott Swenson talks about this year's Howl-O-Scream. What to know for Howl-O-Scream at Busch Gardens Tampa 
Howl-O-Scream, the Halloween scare-fest at Busch Gardens theme park, officially kicks off this weekend in Tampa. 
A two-night "Freaky Preview" event Sept. 25-26 gave guests who are already in the Halloween spirit a chance to check out the event's seven haunted houses, including the new Unearthed: Scarlett's Revenge. 
Here are some thoughts on this year's event. Caption Howl-O-Scream 2015 
Scenes from the Circus of Superstition haunted house at Howl-O-Scream at Busch Gardens Tampa. 
Scenes from the Circus of Superstition haunted house at Howl-O-Scream at Busch Gardens Tampa. (Matt Mauney / Orlando Sentinel) Caption Howl-O-Scream 2015 Matt Mauney / Orlando Sentinel 
Scenes from Howl-O-Scream 2015 at Busch Gardens Tampa. The annual Halloween event runs select nights through Oct. 31. 

Scenes from Howl-O-Scream 2015 at Busch Gardens Tampa. The annual Halloween event runs select nights through Oct. 31. 
See more galleries 
- Unearthed comes from the mind of Robin Cowie , the producer of "The Blair Witch Project." You can tell they built new structures for the haunted house, though the storyline is you're exploring a centuries-old house as Scarlett -- a vengeful demon -- unleashes her revengeful wrath by summoning creatures from past Howl-O-Screams. There's a string a videos promoting the new house , and I must say that watching them ahead of time adds to the frights. That, and large guys in pig masks.
